Package reactor.tcp

Components for writing TCP-based clients and servers using Reactor abstractions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Reconnect
    Implementations of this interface will be instantiated by a Supplier to provide information to the TcpClient whether or not to attempt to reconnect a broken connection.
    TcpConnection<IN,OUT>
    Implementations of this class provide functionality for reading and writing to TCP connections.
    TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec<IN,OUT>
    Spec class for assigning multiple event handlers on a connection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTcpConnection<IN,OUT>
    Implementations of this class should provide concrete functionality for doing real IO.
    TcpClient<IN,OUT>
    The base class for a Reactor-based TCP client.
    TcpServer<IN,OUT>
    Base functionality needed by all servers that communicate with clients over TCP.

Package reactor.tcp Description

Components for writing TCP-based clients and servers using Reactor abstractions.
